root: ^Hello teammate, welcome to the walled city, ment to be one of the last bastions of the apocalypse, but it has also fallen

s: ^What are we supposed to do again?

c-0: ^Well someone infected manage to get inside before turning as what happens with most safe havens
c-1: ^We are here to weaken the number of infected before rescue teams come to evacuate anyone who has not turned. We need to kill 25 zombies before the higher ups give the greenlight to the rescue teams.
^Come back here once you killed them and make sure you don't die as you will just add to their numbers.
